at the place where the ceremony is

generally go in a car by themselves

the car is often decorated with flowers

to be a sign in the back thing just
married in the u.s. wedding receptions
are full of tradition the couple chooses
the customs that are most important to
them
and their families at the wedding
reception all the guests arrive and they
wait then the newlyweds enter everyone
claps and the reception begins there is
a large wedding dinner and of course
there's a wedding cake which can cost
hundreds and sometimes thousands of
dollars when it's time to cut the cake
the couple cuts together holding the
knife together then they feed each other
a piece a small piece or large piece
with their hands at the reception there
are also lots of toasts toasts or
speeches made to the couple generally
they're made with champagne or wine and
the way to get everyone's attention and
let them know that a toast is going to
be made is by clinking on the glass
there's also the custom of clicking or
clinking many times and that's a signal
to the newlyweds that the guests want

the reception is always given by the
best man the best man knows this is his
biggest job he prepares a speech he
rehearses the speech other people can
also give toasts they're not required
but they're welcome to traditionally if
there's more than one toast it will be
from the father of the bride the father
of the groom may be the maid of honor
you can't have a celebration without
dancing at the reception the first dance
is for the bride and groom that first

dance the music is the choice of the

again it's usually a waltz or a slow

sometimes fathers and daughters rehearse

some people choose to have a bridal

gifts line up
men women children and they take turns

before the end of the reception there
are two important customs that almost
always take place in an American wedding
first there's the tossing of the bouquet
and note we have two pronunciations okay
okay the bride turns her back to all the

over her shoulder the unmarried woman
who catches the bouquet is believed to
be the next one to get married the men
have their fun too under the wedding
gown the bride wears a garter around her

garter holds up a sock or a stocking but
in the u.s. today a bride simply wears
this elastic pretty ribbon around her
leg just above the knee and she sits in
a chair and her groom reaches up and
takes the Garter and then he stands and
throws it to the unmarried men so the
bachelor who catches the Garter is also
believed to be the next one who will get
married I should note that many American
Brides choose to wear a blue garter
there's a tradition for a bride to wear
something old something new something

the very less custom I'll tell you about

the honeymoon is the trip that the
